charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1101_010:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
around the city, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across a crowd.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1101_020:
Fantina appeared to be mesmerizing everyone
with her dancing.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_040:
Merci beaucoup for watching my dance, my
friends! I had so much fun!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_050:
If you ever have the time, come see me dance
again, s’il vous plaît!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_110:
Oh! [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I did not see you there!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_120: I must have been too lost in dancing!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_130: There were so many people as well, yes?
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_140:
So many people come to watch when I practice
my dancing!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0401_170: But sometimes, I get to dance with a partner!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_190:
Oh, merci, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I am so happy to hear you say that!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_200:
I would love for everybody who watches me
dance to feel joy in themselves.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_0402_210:
And if they have joy watching me, I am happy
watching them!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_220:
It would be great if I have somebody to dance
with, but ce n’est pas un problème even if I
am alone!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_230: Because to dance is always fun!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_250: Non pardon, not just when I dance.
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_260: Mismagius is with me for all the time!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_270:
Ever since I met Mismagius, I studied so
much about Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_280: And the more I learned about her, the more she...
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_300: Mismagius began to dance along with me!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_310: The instant I saw her dancing so happily...
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_320:
I knew that we were true partners.
C’était le destin!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_370:
I would be delighted if you are getting lost in
la danse with us!
charaepi_ch0151_00_melissa/2301_1201_380:
Mismagius and I will teach you!
We shall have much, much fun!
